title: 3D mammography significantly reduces breast biopsy rates

title_detail.value: 3D mammography significantly reduces breast biopsy rates

summary: The use of digital breast tomosynthesis, also known as 3D mammography, may significantly reduce the number of women who undergo breast biopsy for a non-cancerous lesion following an abnormal mammogram, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: The use of digital breast tomosynthesis, also known as 3D mammography, may significantly reduce the number of women who undergo breast biopsy for a non-cancerous lesion following an abnormal mammogram, according to a new study.
